attributes.action: abolish the introction of solo motorcycle charging in Westminster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The congestion zone was initially introduced to cut "congestion"

There was a push from government for the people of London to leavetheir cars at home and use alternative transport such as motorcycles, push bikes and public transport.

Now Westminster are penalising solo motorcycle owners by imposing a £1.50 charge per day to use motorcycle bays.

Government pushed us into a corner by imposing such high charges on car owners , driving us to find an alternative. This in essence cut London's congestion situation.

Motorcycle bays should be FREE of Charge.

We understand that Westminster have created 1000 new bays for cyclists but this introduction is a benefit to the city as a whole, cutting congestion, easing some of the burden on public transport and giving small business owners a chance to survive in todays hard economic situation.


Please don't tax people who you have forced into a corner to cut congestion.

Please give small businesses a chance. Transport is key.

We all pay our Coulcil Tax


I personally have a Westminster parking permit and now Westminster want to charge £150 per annum to park in motorcycle bays.

rejection.details: Please forward this matter tot he Greater London Assembly
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
